outputs.output_descr: To draw upon the lessons learnt from functioning of institutional arrangements and operational mechanisms employed for the National Phase-out Management Plan (NPOP) and to the extent possible integrate existing infrastructures through data collection analysis, stakeholders workshops and development of strategy.

project_descr: To draw upon lessons learnt from institutional arrangements and operational mechanisms employed by National Phase-out Management Plan and to integrate existing infrastructures using data collection analysis, stakeholder meetings and strategic development
